command.penguinlib.team.create.must_leav:
你已經在一個團隊中了！
你必須離開才能創建一個新的團隊！
%s
command.penguinlib.team.create.name_in_u: 你不能將 %s 用於你的團隊名，因為它已經在使用中。
command.penguinlib.team.create.success: 你創建了一個名為: %s 的新團隊
command.penguinlib.team.invite.failure: 找不到名為 %s 的玩家。
command.penguinlib.team.invite.message: 您已被邀請加入 %s 團隊。加入 -> %s
command.penguinlib.team.invite.none: 您沒有待處理的團隊邀請。
command.penguinlib.team.invite.success: 您已邀請 %s 加入您的團隊。
command.penguinlib.team.join.must_leave:
YOU ARE ALREADY IN A TEAM!
You must leave it in order to join a new one!
%s
command.penguinlib.team.join.not_exist: No team with the name %s can be found!
command.penguinlib.team.join.success.mem: You are now a member of the team %s, Welcome!
command.penguinlib.team.join.success.not: You have not been invited to the %s team. Ask %s for an invite.
command.penguinlib.team.join.success.own: The team %s had no owner. You have now taken control!
command.penguinlib.team.leave.cannot: You cannot leave your own personal team!
command.penguinlib.team.leave.name_in_us: You cannot use %s for your new team as it is already in use.
command.penguinlib.team.reject.not_exist: No team with the name %s can be found!
command.penguinlib.team.reject.not_invit: You have not been invited to join %s!
command.penguinlib.team.reject.success: You have rejected the invite to join %s.
